Name: Drift 7 Islands (survival)
About the game: Drift 7 Islands is a survival game with pixel graph and 2.5D view. At first, it is free And simple, so players can randomly generate ocean and fragmented islands to survive. Therefore, players must be extremely careful in every action and carefully calculate the resources they have. Players must also be cautious towards every creature, who are never easy to be caught. Eating raw food alone canâ€™t guarantee survival.
